Trenton.Thomas McCall Cadwalader:
Thomas McCall Cadwalader (1795–1873) was an American who trained to be a lawyer but made his career in the military, retiring as a Major general.


== Life ==
Thomas McCall Cadwalader was born on the family estate called Greenwood in Trenton, New Jersey on September 11, 1795. His father was Lambert Cadwalader (1742–1823) and mother was Mary McCall (1764–1848), a descendant of the Schuyler and the Van Cortlandt families through her ancestors Stephanus Van Cortlandt and Gertrude Schuyler.
